topic.title: Editing Mail Setup
topic.p: You can change the settings for a user's mailbox at any time.

ol.title: To edit the mail setup:

li.p: In the User Management menu group, click User List (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary). For more information about expanding and collapsing menu groups, see Menus and Navigation.

ol.li: Select properties for the user you want. The Properties window appears.
Next to Mail Setup, click Edit.

Select any desired services. Webmail: enables the user to read and manage email messages using a Web browser. If Webmail is enabled, both the Webmail client and a stand-alone email client can be used. SpamAssassin: uses heuristic tests on incoming mail messages to identify unsolicited commercial email messages. If the user subscribes to SpamAssassin, suspected junk mail is filtered to the user's Junk folder. ClamAV: scans and filters email attachments that contain viruses. If the user subscribes to ClamAV, email messages that contain viruses are routed to the user's Quarantine folder.
Click Save. A message appears informing you that the user has been changed.
